text: Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for streaming games is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1050. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The screen brightness is also top-notch. It's a decent gaming laptop for the money. Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Call of Duty: Warzone and Fortnite.
